data.text: @double_u_bee @DinaLshamy Lmao no I've been unfortunately following  along and have come to the sad conclusion that Brad Pitt is a pos. I would give him the benefit of the doubt but he's shit.nicki minaj on the other hand..

@Iheartlazydays @DinaLshamy Many celebrity gossip articles are simply made up. They're fiction. They take a situation, like Brad Pitt and Angelina Jolie's divorce and turn it into Brad v Angelina. Truth be told, we have no idea what's going on in Pitt or Jolie's heads. These articles are just guess work
@Iheartlazydays @DinaLshamy I wouldn't believe anything you read in articles, unless the words have directly come from his mouth. All top often they literally make shit up.

@DinaLshamy Just google her name. Every article is Brad bitching about something as usual. He's like one of those exes that won't leave your momma alone and has her asking you to get back with him. He is delusional and crazy.
